title: Roast beef and Yorkshire pudding, roast potatoes and creamed horseradish
description: A simple Sunday roast with all the wonderful trimmings. Making your own Yorkshire puddings and creamed horseradish adds a special touch.
ingredients: 1 x 5kg/11lb rib of beef, French trimmed (you can ask your butcher to do this for you)
mixed root vegetables, such as carrots or parsnips, roughly chopped
olive oil or goose fat, at room temperature
potatoes, such as Maris Piper or King Edward, chopped
sea salt and ground black pepper
salt and freshly ground black pepper
